title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2868/93 of 20 October 1993 amending Annex X to Regulation (EEC) No 3587/86 fixing the conversion factors to be applied to the buying-in prices for fruit and vegetables as regards apples
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2868/93 of 20 October 1993 amending Annex X to Regulation (EEC) No 3587/86 fixing the conversion factors to be applied to the buying-in prices for fruit and vegetables as regards apples
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Annex X 'Apples' to Regulation (EEC) No 3587/86 is hereby amended as follows:
in the first indent of '(a) variety', 'Gala and mutations' is added after 'Elstar'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 October 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 69, 20. 3. 1993, p. 7.
(3) OJ No L 334, 27. 11. 1986, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 239, 24. 9. 1993, p. 16.
